text: Nasrudin was walking through the busy city of Baghdad when he collided with another man and both fell to the ground. "Sorry", he said politely as he got up. Is it you or is it me? Because if it's me, then I must be you. "Whoever you are, you're a complete lunatic", replied the other man. It's just that you and I are of a similar complexion and we wear similar clothes. I thought I might have gotten confused in the fall. FIN
title: Confusión ontológica
author: nan Anónimo
